title: Do We Need A Narrative? with Obaid Omer
description:
I chat with Obaid Omer on why he left Islam, what our society is up for in a world moving past religious narratives, and the importance of symbols 

Follow him on twitter @obaidomer

Follow me on twitter @theother_95
